 */import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const getLanguageFromFilename=fileName=>{const ext=fileName.split('.').pop().toLowerCase();const languageMap={'js':'javascript','jsx':'jsx','ts':'typescript','tsx':'tsx','py':'python','html':'html','css':'css','json':'json','md':'markdown','java':'java','c':'c','cpp':'cpp','go':'go','rs':'rust','php':'php','rb':'ruby','sh':'bash','yml':'yaml','yaml':'yaml','sql':'sql','graphql':'graphql','swift':'swift','kt':'kotlin'};return languageMap[ext]||'text';};/**

 */const CodeViewer=_ref=>{let{files=[],generation=null}=_ref;const[selectedFile,setSelectedFile]=useState(null);const[selectedContent,setSelectedContent]=useState('');const[showLineNumbers,setShowLineNumbers]=useState(true);// Â∞ÜÊâÄÊúâHookÁßªÂà∞ÁªÑ‰ª∂È°∂Â±Ç
const isDarkMode=useColorModeValue(false,true);const bgColor=useColorModeValue('white','gray.800');const borderColor=useColorModeValue('gray.200','gray.600');const codeBgColor=useColorModeValue('gray.50','gray.700');// Êñá‰ª∂Ê†ëÁä∂ÊÄÅ
const[expandedFolders,setExpandedFolders]=useState({});// ÂàùÂßãÈÄâÊã©Á¨¨‰∏Ä‰∏™Êñá‰ª∂
useEffect(()=>{if(files.length>0&&!selectedFile){setSelectedFile(files[0].path);setSelectedContent(files[0].content);}},[files,selectedFile]);// Êñá‰ª∂ÈÄâÊã©Â§ÑÁêÜ
const handleFileSelect=path=>{const file=files.find(f=>f.path===path);if(file){setSelectedFile(path);setSelectedContent(file.content);}};// Â§çÂà∂‰ª£Á†ÅÂ§ÑÁêÜ
const handleCopyCode=()=>{navigator.clipboard.writeText(selectedContent);};// Â§ÑÁêÜÊñá‰ª∂Â§πÂ±ïÂºÄ/ÊäòÂè†

60px)",borderWidth:"1px",borderRadius:"md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{w:"250px",borderRightWidth:"1px",bg:bgColor,overflowY:"auto",children:renderFileTree()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{flex:"1",position:"relative",children:selectedFile?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Flex,{justify:"space-between",align:"center",p:2,borderBottomWidth:"1px",bg:codeBgColor,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{fontWeight:"bold",fontSize:"sm",children:selectedFile}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(HStack,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{label:"\u663E\u793A/\u9690\u85CF\u884C\u53F7",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:"xs",variant:showLineNumbers?"solid":"outline",onClick:()=>setShowLineNumbers(!showLineNumbers),children:"\u884C\u53F7"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Tooltip,{label:"\u590D\u5236\u4EE3\u7801",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IconButton,{size:"xs",icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CopyIcon,{}),onClick:handleCopyCode,"aria-label":"\u590D\u5236\u4EE3\u7801"})})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{overflowY:"auto",h:"calc(100% - 40px)",fontSize:"sm",p:4,fontFamily:"monospace",whiteSpace:"pre",bg:isDarkMode?'gray.800':'white',color:isDarkMode?'white':'black',children:showLineNumbers?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("table",{style:{borderCollapse:'collapse',width:'100%'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:selectedContent.split('\n').map((line,i)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{style:{lineHeight:'1.5'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{color:isDarkMode?'gray.400':'gray.500',textAlign:'right',paddingRight:'1rem',userSelect:'none',width:'1%',whiteSpace:'nowrap',borderRight:'1px solid',borderColor:isDarkMode?'gray.600':'gray.200'},children:i+1}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{paddingLeft:'1rem'},children:line})]},i))})}):selectedContent})]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Flex,{h:"100%",justify:"center",align:"center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Text,{color:"gray.500",children:"\u8BF7\u9009\u62E9\u6587\u4EF6\u67E5\u770B\u4EE3\u7801"})})})]})]});};export default CodeViewer;
